resources.string:
This app start A specific app activity by using Intent and ComponentName from Android API:

 yourIntent.setComponent(new ComponentName("com.android.settings", "com.android.settings.Settings$DeviceInfoSettingsActivity"));

 Some package.class names are different, and should be typed differently above, depending on the activity you want to start. You can get names of all installed activities that you can launch with ComponentName using 'Nova Launcher' Activities shortcut, or by 'Quick Shortcut Maker' apps.
 Also some activities may not be installed on different devices, so the button may crash on some devices.
 The button will start Settings>About Phone.
